text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix Hero Edition 15.6" Gaming Laptop, 8th-Gen Intel Core i5-8300H Processor (Up to 3.9 GHz), GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB, 120 Hz 3 ms Display, 8 GB DDR4, 128 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD, RGB KB!

The ASUS ROG Strix Hero Edition 15.6" Gaming Laptop, 8th-Gen Intel Core i5-8300H Processor (Up to 3.9 GHz), GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB, 120 Hz 3 ms Display, 8 GB DDR4, 128 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD, RGB KB does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the keyboard could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the ASUS ROG Strix Hero Edition 15.6" Gaming Laptop, 8th-Gen Intel Core i5-8300H Processor (Up to 3.9 GHz), GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB, 120 Hz 3 ms Display, 8 GB DDR4, 128 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD, RGB KB is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the ASUS ROG Strix Hero Edition 15.6" Gaming Laptop, 8th-Gen Intel Core i5-8300H Processor (Up to 3.9 GHz), GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB, 120 Hz 3 ms Display, 8 GB DDR4, 128 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD, RGB KB!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 is good, but I expected a bit more from the port selection on the ASUS ROG Strix Hero Edition 15.6" Gaming Laptop, 8th-Gen Intel Core i5-8300H Processor (Up to 3.9 GHz), GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4 GB, 120 Hz 3 ms Display, 8 GB DDR4, 128 GB PCIe SSD + 1 TB SSHD, RGB KB. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.
